div.p: What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: What type of place is found at a given location. More than one descriptor may be applicable.

display.value: At or during work, in a workplace setting.

definition.value: At or during work, in a workplace setting.

display.value: At home

definition.value: At home

display.value: In a residential setting

definition.value: In a residential setting

display.value: A primary or secondary school

definition.value: A primary or secondary school

display.value: In a parked or moving vehicle

definition.value: In a parked or moving vehicle

display.value: An non-manufacturing, indoor business setting

definition.value: An non-manufacturing, indoor business setting

display.value: A manufacturing-oriented business setting

definition.value: A manufacturing-oriented business setting

display.value: A place of business

definition.value: A place of business

display.value: A setting where food is served

definition.value: A place where food is prepared

display.value: Workplace that is primarily outdoors

definition.value: Workplace that is primarily outdoors

display.value: A setting where manufacturing takes place

definition.value: A setting where manufacturing takes place

display.value: A building or residence that is owned

definition.value: A building or residence that is owned

definition.value: A building or residence that is rented

definition.value: Hotel or motel

display.value: Psychiatric hospital or other psychiatric facility

definition.value: Psychiatric hospital or other psychiatric facility

display.value: Substance abuse treatment facility or detox center

definition.value: Substance abuse treatment facility or detox center

display.value: Individual resides in a correctional facility, state hospital, jail, prison, youth authority facility, juvenile hall, boot camp or Boys Ranch.
